title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Clinical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can study three core clinical skills (intravenous injection, wound care, and basic vital sign measurement) via smartphone.
Learners can achieve over 85% accuracy in real-case simulations through weekly project assignments.
Learners can write self-assessment reports based on peer feedback and expert comments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
